src:
Serasa Salad Bar: Ada Mexican Tuna dan Salad Roll yang Segar Sehat
04 Nov 2019, 10:20 by Andi Annisa Dwi Rahmawati - detikFood


Foto: dok. detikFood

Jakarta - Penggemar makanan sehat bisa coba ragam olahan salad di sini. Ada yang dipadukan irisan tuna panggang hingga dibuat dalam bentuk roll.Semakin banyak orang yang memilih jalani pola makan sehat. Rata-rata mereka mengurangi konsumsi karbohidrat dan beralih pada asupan tinggi serat dan protein. Mereka mengonsumsi banyak sayuran, buah, dan protein tanpa lemak seperti ikan atau dada ayam.Soal menu andalan, pelaku hidup sehat umumnya memilih salad sebagai santapan harian. Menu ini mudah diracik sendiri, namun sekarang ada banyak tempat makan yang menawarkan salad sebagai menu andalan mereka. Salah satunya Serasa Salad Bar di kawasan Cipete.


Foto: dok. detikFood

Mampir ke gerainya yang mungil, kami disambut suasana minimalis serba putih dengan kesan asri. Sebab di dalam restoran ada ada banyak tanaman hijau yang menyejukkan mata. Pengunjung bisa meracik salad sendiri dengan memilih ragam sayuran yang tersedia di balik lemari kaca.Kalau mau lebih praktis, pilih saja menu paket buatan Serasa Salad Bar. Ada Green Fiesta Salad, Thai Beef Salad, Caesar Chicken Salad, sampai Salad Roll. Untuk santap sore, kami memilih Mexican Tuna Salad (Rp 58.000) dan Salad Roll (Rp 48.000).Mexican Tuna Salad disajikan dalam mangkuk putih lebar. Tampilannya warna-warni dan nampak menggugah selera. Isian salad ini ada selada, alpukat, bengkuang, jagung bumbu pedas, tomat cherry, kubis ungu, mentimun, dan batang seledri.


Foto: dok. detikFood

Semua sayuran terasa segar. Ada 'permainan' tekstur dari penggunaan selada dan alpukat yang teksturnya lembut sampai bengkuang dan batang seledri yang renyah. Kami menyukai pipilan jagung di sini. Tekstur jagungnya empuk dengan baluran bubuk kemerahan yang pedas gurih.Untuk primadonanya adalah fillet tuna yang dipanggang sebentar hingga tingkat kematangan medium. Fillet ini ditaburi wijen hitam. Rasanya ikannya kuat karena tidak diberi banyak bumbu. Untuk teman mengunyah salad, tersedia tortilla chips yang renyah.Mexican Tuna Salad dilengkapi Mexican dressing. Rasanya asam gurih karena dibuat dari paduan bombay, tomat, daun ketumbar, dan mayonnaise. Menyantap seporsi salad ini dijamin mengenyangkan!Salad Roll juga patut dicicip. Bentuk salad ini unik karena digulung seperti sushi. Sayuran diiris kecil-kecil dan memanjang seperti paprika kuning, kyuri, kubis ungu, dan wortel. Pembungkusnya adalah rice paper yang bening transparan.


Foto: dok. detikFood

Seporsi salad roll berisi sekitar 11 gulungan. Rasanya renyah segar dan memberi sensasi tersendiri saat dimakan dengan sumpit. Sebagai cocolannya tersedia Japanese dressing. Kami menyukai dressing ini karena rasanya gurih creamy. Diracik dari rumput laut, wijen, dan wortel.Untuk membilas dahaga, ada Ruby Sparks (Rp 38.000) yang jadi favorit. Warna minuman ini cantik karena dibuat dari paduan semangka, kiwi, dan buah naga. Tak tercecap rasa manis tambahan pada smoothies ini. Rasa manisnya alami dan samar dari buah yang dipakai. Tercecap rasa buah naga yang paling dominan.


Foto: dok. detikFood

Selain salad dan smoothies, Serasa Salad Bar punya Smoothie Bowl yang bisa dicoba. Pencinta salad juga bisa membeli dressing kemasan jar untuk dibawa pulang. Kalau kamu termasuk penggemar makanan sehat, tak ada salahnya mampir ke kafe salad mungil ini.Serasa Salad BarJalan Cipete I No 1 CDJakarta SelatanTelepon: 087887160790 Simak Video "Terjawab Sudah Cara Pelayan Bawa Piring di Rumah Makan Padang "[Gambas:Video 20detik](adr/odi)
text:
Serasa Salad Bar: There is a Fresh Healthy Mexican Tuna and Salad Roll
Nov 04 2019, 10:20 AM by Andi Annisa Dwi Rahmawati - detikFood


Photo: dock. detikFood

Jakarta - Fans of healthy food can try a variety of processed salads here. There is a combination of sliced tuna roasted until made in the form of roll. More and more people are choosing to live a healthy diet. On average they reduce carbohydrate consumption and switch to high fiber and protein intake. They eat lots of vegetables, fruits, and lean protein such as fish or chicken breast. Regarding the mainstay menu, healthy living people generally choose salad as a daily meal. This menu is easy to make by yourself, but now there are many eating places that offer salads as their mainstay menu. One of them is Serasa Salad Bar in the Cipete area.


Photo: dock. detikFood

Dropping into a small shop, we were greeted by a minimalist atmosphere all white with a beautiful impression. Because in the restaurant there are many green plants that soothe the eyes. Visitors can mix their own salads by choosing a variety of vegetables that are available behind the showcase. If you want more practical, just choose a package menu made by Serasa Salad Bar. There are Green Fiesta Salad, Thai Beef Salad, Caesar Chicken Salad, to Salad Roll. For lunch, we chose Mexican Tuna Salad (Rp. 58,000) and Salad Roll (Rp. 48,000). The Mexican Tuna Salad is served in a wide white bowl. It looks colorful and appetizing. The salad filling includes lettuce, avocado, yam, spicy corn, cherry tomatoes, purple cabbage, cucumber, and celery sticks.


Photo: dock. detikFood

All vegetables taste fresh. There is a texture 'game' from the use of lettuce and avocado whose texture is soft to yam and crispy celery sticks. We love the cornflakes here. Soft corn texture with a savory spicy reddish powder mixture. For prima donna is tuna fillets that are briefly roasted to medium level. This fillet is sprinkled with black sesame. The taste of the fish is strong because it isn't given much seasoning. For a friend to chew on a salad, crispy tortilla chips are available. The Mexican Tuna Salad comes with Mexican dressing. It tastes sour because it is made from a mixture of bombay, tomatoes, coriander leaves, and mayonnaise. Eating a plate of salad is guaranteed to be filling! Salad Roll is also worth a taste. The shape of this salad is unique because it is rolled like sushi. Vegetables are sliced into small pieces and elongated like yellow paprika, kyuri, purple cabbage, and carrots. The packaging is transparent clear rice paper.


Photo: dock. detikFood

A salad roll contains about 11 rolls. It feels crispy fresh and gives its own sensation when eaten with chopsticks. As a snack available Japanese dressing. We love this dressing because it tastes creamy. Blended from seaweed, sesame, and carrots. To rinse thirst, there are Ruby Sparks (Rp. 38,000) which are favorites. The color of this drink is beautiful because it is made from a blend of watermelon, kiwi, and dragon fruit. No added sweetness to this smoothies. The natural and faint sweetness of the fruit used. Taste the most dominant dragon fruit taste.


Photo: dock. detikFood

In addition to salads and smoothies, Serasa Salad Bar has a Smoothie Bowl that you can try. Salad lovers can also buy jar packaging dressings to take home. If you are a fan of healthy food, there's no harm in stopping by this tiny salad cafe. Feels like Salad Bar Cipete I Road No. 1 CDJakarta Selatan Phone: 087887160790 See Video "Answered Already How Minions Bring Plates to Padang Restaurants" [Gambas: Video 20second] (adr / odi)
